title: playing issue
body:
i wanna play lol on my laptop through mobile data connection the internet works fine but always gives request timed out and after i select my champ the game is not working then 
Kindly need to know how to solve this issue

replies.body: Getting a request timed out message means that your network either couldn't reach our servers or never got a response. Try updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick to make sure you're getting a clear connection, but let me know if that doesn't help.
you could try repair lol client maybe
